**c)** d/dx (x² cos x) = 2x cos x - x² sin x, d²/dx² = 2 cos x - 2x sin x - x² cos x, d³/dx³ = -2 sin x - 2 sin x - 2x cos x - x² (-sin x) = -4 sin x - 2x cos x + x² sin x

**d)** y' = sin x cos x + x cos x cos x + x sin x (-sin x) = sin x cos x + x cos² x - x sin² x, y'' = cos x cos x + sin x (-sin x) + cos² x + x (-2 cos x sin x) - (sin² x + x 2 sin x cos x), y''' = complex trigonometric derivatives

**b)** y' = (e^x x - e^x)/x² = e^x (x - 1)/x², y'' = quotient rule on this, y''' = quotient rule again
